text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Palmerston | settlement_type = Town | image_skyline = Palmerston Town Hall, Otago - panoramio.jpg | image_caption = Palmerston Town Hall | pushpin_map = | pushpin_map_caption = Location of Palmerston within New Zealand | image_map = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = New Zealand | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Otago | subdivision_type2 = Territorial authority | subdivision_name2 = Waitaki District | subdivision_type3 = Ward | subdivision_name3 = Waihemo Ward | subdivision_type4 = Community | subdivision_name4 = Waihemo Community | seat_type = Electorates | seat = | leader_title = | leader_name = Waitaki District Council | leader_title1 = Regional council | leader_name1 = Otago Regional Council | leader_title2 = Mayor of Waitaki | leader_name2 = | leader_title3 = Waitaki MP | leader_name3 = | leader_title4 = Te Tai Tonga MP | leader_name4 = | elevation_m = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 8.75 | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = NZST | utc_offset1 = +12 | timezone1_DST = NZDT | utc_offset1_DST = +13 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = | blank_name = Local iwi | blank_info = NgƒÅi Tahu }} Palmerston is a town in the Waitaki District, New Zealand. It is located on State Highway 1 and 85. It is 54 kilometers northwest of Dunedin and 59 kilometers south of Oamaru. It has two churches, primary school and high school situated in the town. ==References== Category:Towns in Otago Category:Waitaki District
